d:
I'm bringing back this series with new endings, one for each of the girls. New chapters may take two or three months to release, as the chapters are bigger, so it takes longer to make.

Enjoying the series? Join me on my support pages for early access to the already produced chapters of this series and other exclusive comics. Your support helps me keep creating more stories!

My links:

https://www.deviantart.com/rollb/subscriptions
https://subscribestar.adult/rollb
https://rollb.fanbox.cc/
n: [Misc] [RollB] Doki Doki Hypno Club - New Endings [English]
